job.title: Software Engineer (Java Platform Web Developer)
job.description: stronguJob DescriptionbrbrustrongImportant Note During the application process ensure your contact information email and phone number is up to date and upload your current resume when submitting your application for consideration To participate in some selection activities you will need to respond to an invitation The invitation can be sent by both email and text message In order to receive text message invitations your profile must include a mobile phone number designated as Personal Cell or Cellular in the contact information of your applicationbrbrAt Wells Fargo we are looking for talented people who will put our customers at the center of everything we do We are seeking candidates who embrace diversity equity and inclusion in a workplace where everyone feels valued and inspiredbrbrHelp us build a better Wells Fargo It all begins with outstanding talent It all begins with youbrbrTechnology sets IT strategy enhances the design development and operations of our systems optimizes the Wells Fargo infrastructure provides information security and enables Wells Fargo global customers to have 24 hours a day 7 days a week banking access through inbranch online ATMs and other channelsbrbrOur mission is to deliver stable secure scalable and innovative services at speeds that delight and satisfy our customers and unleash the skills potential of our employeesbrbrThe Legal Technology Java Platform Web Developer will provide technology leadership and solution development for the Legal Technology Matter Management application platform This role is part of an AgileScrum team providing a critical software engineering function serving the Wells Fargo Legal department to develop key business functionality This platform is used by the Wells Fargo Legal Department Attorneys Paralegals Compliance Managers and Fees Consultants to manage daytoday Legal operations This position will require strong agile background and
